oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Steel engraving (portrait) of President Andrew Johnson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Steel engraving of President Andrew Johnson. This item is found on the inside cover of the bound volume containing the Presidential Pardon for Lieutenant General Nathan Bedford Forrest. It is probably an illustration taken from a postcard. The artist is unidentified.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Historical Society Civil War Collection, 1860-1982
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnson, Andrew 1808-1875
Presidents; Steel engravings
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
